name: Banana Chaos
description:
-Get Bannammo- Destroy Crates- Avoid Carts-

____________________________________________________

W = Jump & Double Jump

A = Left

D = Right

Spacebar = Jump & Double Jump

Left Mouse Button = Attack & Throw Banammo 

Right Mouse Button = Attack

____________________________________________________

Press Number   " 1 "   for  Quick Level  Reset 

____________________________________________________

I made like 95% of the Visual Assets and Audio in the week (August 22nd 2021 -August 29th 2021)

 using Blender for 3D art and MediBang for 2D art, All sounds where recorded and edited using Audacity as my audio editor. 

Construct 2 was used as the game engine. Music was lifted from (Sounds for the Supermarket) (1975) found on YouTube.

____________________________________________________

Made in 7-Days By Patrick Carmichael 

for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

____________________________________________________

Thank you For Playing
